item.title: What we know about US seizure of oil tanker off Venezuela
item.description: The US seizure of a crude oil ship is the latest in a series of escalations in the Trump administration's pressure campaign on Venezuela.

item.title: Shares in AI giant Oracle fall after revenue results ramp up bubble fears
item.description: The cloud computing giant's revenue miss renews questions about its financial health.

item.title: Pakistan's military sentences its former spy chief to 14 years in jail
item.description: Faiz Hameed led Pakistan's ISI intelligence agency during the tenure of now-jailed former PM Imran Khan.

item.title: 'Architects of AI' named Time Magazine's Person of the Year
item.description: Nvidia boss Jensen Huang is among the influential tech figures that adorn one of the two covers.

item.title: Poland arrests Russian archaeologist wanted in Ukraine
item.description: The allegations against the suspect includes the illegal excavation of an ancient city in Crimea.
